[Y]Strategy Shelf
[W]Thinking games age beautifully.
[c][m.]
[W]Turn-based design suits constrained
[W]hardware and gives room for deeper
[W]systems.
[W]Good feedback loops make complex rules
[W]feel understandable.
[c][m.]
[G]- Clear win goals.
[G]- Transparent numbers.
[G]- Short turn cycles.
[m][m-]
[Y]NOTE
[C]Teach your systems in the first two
[C]turns.
[c][m.]
[C]0 MAIN   [W]# HELP
